item.description:
Discuss V-Pedia, sweethearts, sweetmeats, fine bookshops, good mid-town ski-jumps, free conferences, and other essential parts of life.

I'm still very open about where and what time to hold this one; please weigh in, especially if you who don't live in mid-Cambridge, or haven't been able to make it to a meetup before.
item.name: Boston Wikipedia Pre-V-Day Meetup
